message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $6,000, you take $4,000. This avoids us both losing money to inflation.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be fairer to each other. I propose I take $6,000 and you take $4,000.  Consider that inflation hurts you more than me in the next round.
Bob, we're running out of time and losing money. I'll be more generous this time. I take $5,500, you get $4,500. Let's end this before inflation eats more of our potential winnings.
